title: Certificate of structural design adequacy at the time of completion (1) shall be in the following fo
clause_text: Certificate of structural design adequacy at the time of completion (1) shall be in the following format :- I / we have been appointed as Structural Engineer by M/s. for preparing the structural design and drawings for the New structure consisting of floors, construction of --------- additional floors over existing structure with floors, as described in
section: C-4.3 Duties and Responsibilities of Structural Engineer

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
